extendedInfo.description: Whether you've been playing for years or have only just started, Poker Boss gets you into the fray unlike anything that's come before.  Free, sleek, and feature-packed, this app by the studio that brought you Word Breaker is one of a kind.â Exclusive Overlay Mode! âUse this learning tool and any supported online Poker app AT THE SAME TIME! â Incredibly easy and fast controls âEverything has been designed for speed and ease of use so that you donât miss a beat, even in tough one-on-one situations!  Tap the cards to update the table, and see the odds change instantly.â Personalized and memorable play suggestions âPoker Bossâs unique Trainer Mode offers suggestions that evolve as the game plays out!  The witty banter keeps you engaged, and it isnât afraid to let you know when itâs time to put your chips on the line.â Detailed statistics at your fingertips âPoker Boss does all the math for you and presents it in simple, varied ways for you to understand your odds at a glance.  Whether you just need to know how often your hand will win, or if your advanced skills rely on knowing the possibilities of a particular straight, itâs all there.â Supports the Top Apps âPoker Boss currently supports the top two Poker apps on Android: Zynga Poker and DH Texas Poker.  We're continuing to add support for new Poker apps. If you have a favorite Poker app you'd like to see supported in the future, email us at support@firecrackersw.com.â Included Manual âOur included help manual not only details our app, but informs you about the game of Poker as well.  If you're an absolute beginner, understanding a certain hand is only a tap away.â In-app Upgrade âPoker Boss is completely free and ad-supported, and no features are held back.  If you wish to support us, an easy in-app upgrade is available that will remove all advertisements with our thanks.â Just Start Winning at Poker âNo matter your ability level the Poker Boss trainer will help you to just start winning at Poker.  Since we can't tell you what cards the other players have, it's not even cheating!

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: A very nifty tool that has an easy to use interface, great for beginners or masters.
reviews.author: Jessica Jones
